item.description:
Permaculture advocates, students, designers or just interested people getting together for a pot luck meal [how about i get pizza this time? + bring whatever you want to share] and a discussion of permaculture concepts, plans and actions!

This month we'll talk about a few different aspects of permaculture design. I'm suggesting:
Zones
Sheet Mulching
Stacking Functions

Please see the message board for more details.
We'll also talk about the upcoming workshop on Apr 29/30!


We will be learning from each other on mini permaculture topics as well as planning for upcoming events and outreach.

For more information, see http://maps.google.co...

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: The Portland Permaculture April Meetup
